channel.title: Are these right?
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Good to know everyone here is useless.[/size]
client reading server packetType-need to know if these are right:
[code] if (pktSize==-1) pktSize=inBuffer[1] & 0xff;//is this an Unsigned byte? if (pktSize==-2) pktSize=(inBuffer[1] << 8 & 0xff)+(inBuffer[2] & 0xff);//is this an UnsignedWord?[/code]

item.title: Are these right?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[size=24pt]Good to know everyone here is useless.[/size]

client reading server packetType-need to know if these are right:

if (pktSize==-1) pktSize=inBuffer[1] & 0xff;//is this an Unsigned byte? if (pktSize==-2) pktSize=(inBuffer[1] << 8 & 0xff)+(inBuffer[2] & 0xff);//is this an UnsignedWord?
